price: Alipo waambia ndugu yao, Nuhu: Je! Hamchimngu?.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Waliukanusha Utume huu pale alipo waambia ndugu yao Nuhu - ndugu kwa makhusiano ya nasaba si kwa Dini - akiwahadharisha: Hamumchi Mwenyezi Mungu, mkaacha kuabudu wenginewe?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum nūḥun alā tattaqūna
